scripts.dev: sed -i "s/\(VITE_ORACLE_ADDRESS *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("votingPeriodOracle") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/testing-state.json)/" .env && sed -i "s/\(VITE_TEMPLATE_ADDRESS_TEZOSTEMPLATE *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("tezosTemplate3") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/testing-state.json)/" .env  && sed -i "s/\(VITE_TEMPLATE_ADDRESS_PERMISSIONEDSIMPLEPOLL *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("permissionedSimplePoll") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/testing-state.json)/" .env  && vite dev --host
scripts.prod: sed -i "s/\(VITE_ORACLE_ADDRESS *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("votingPeriodOracle") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/production-state.json)/" .env && sed -i "s/\(VITE_TEMPLATE_ADDRESS_TEZOSTEMPLATE *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("tezosTemplate3") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/production-state.json)/" .env  && sed -i "s/\(VITE_TEMPLATE_ADDRESS_PERMISSIONEDSIMPLEPOLL *= *\).*/\1$(jq -r 'last(.tasks[] | select(.output[0].alias | contains("permissionedSimplePoll") )?) | .output[0].address' ../.taq/production-state.json)/" .env  && vite --host
scripts.sync: npm run build && ionic cap sync --no-build
